00037     template<typename SCALARTYPE, typename F, unsigned int ALIGNMENT, unsigned int VEC_ALIGNMENT>
00038     void inplace_solve(const matrix<SCALARTYPE, F, ALIGNMENT> & mat,
00039                        vector<SCALARTYPE, VEC_ALIGNMENT> & vec,
00040                        upper_tag)
00041     {
00042       assert(mat.size1() == vec.size());
00043       assert(mat.size2() == vec.size());
00044 
00045       unsigned int pos = 0;
00046       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::upper_triangular_substitute_inplace.setArgument(pos++, mat.handle());
00047       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::upper_triangular_substitute_inplace.setArgument(pos++, vec.handle());
00048       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::upper_triangular_substitute_inplace.setArgument(pos++, mat.internal_size2());
00049       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::upper_triangular_substitute_inplace.setArgument(pos++, vec.size());
00050       
00051       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::upper_triangular_substitute_inplace.start1D(viennacl::ocl::device().work_items_per_group(),
00052                                                                                          viennacl::ocl::device().work_items_per_group());
00053     }
00054 
00060     template<typename SCALARTYPE, typename F, unsigned int ALIGNMENT, unsigned int VEC_ALIGNMENT>
00061     void inplace_solve(const matrix<SCALARTYPE, F, ALIGNMENT> & mat,
00062                        vector<SCALARTYPE, VEC_ALIGNMENT> & vec,
00063                        unit_upper_tag)
00064     {
00065       assert(mat.size1() == vec.size());
00066       assert(mat.size2() == vec.size());
00067 
00068       unsigned int pos = 0;
00069       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::unit_upper_triangular_substitute_inplace.setArgument(pos++, mat.handle());
00070       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::unit_upper_triangular_substitute_inplace.setArgument(pos++, vec.handle());
00071       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::unit_upper_triangular_substitute_inplace.setArgument(pos++, mat.internal_size2());
00072       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::unit_upper_triangular_substitute_inplace.setArgument(pos++, vec.size());
00073       
00074       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::unit_upper_triangular_substitute_inplace.start1D(viennacl::ocl::device().work_items_per_group(),
00075                                                                                               viennacl::ocl::device().work_items_per_group());
00076     }

00078     //upper triangular solver for transposed lower triangular matrices
00084     template<typename SCALARTYPE, typename F, unsigned int ALIGNMENT, unsigned int VEC_ALIGNMENT>
00085     void inplace_solve(const transposed_matrix_proxy<SCALARTYPE, F, ALIGNMENT> & proxy,
00086                        vector<SCALARTYPE, VEC_ALIGNMENT> & vec,
00087                        upper_tag)
00088     {
00089       assert(proxy.get_matrix().size1() == vec.size());
00090       assert(proxy.get_matrix().size2() == vec.size());
00091 
00092       unsigned int pos = 0;
00093       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::trans_upper_triangular_substitute_inplace.setArgument(pos++, proxy.get_matrix().handle());
00094       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::trans_upper_triangular_substitute_inplace.setArgument(pos++, vec.handle());
00095       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::trans_upper_triangular_substitute_inplace.setArgument(pos++, proxy.get_matrix().internal_size2());
00096       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::trans_upper_triangular_substitute_inplace.setArgument(pos++, vec.size());
00097       
00098       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::trans_upper_triangular_substitute_inplace.start1D(viennacl::ocl::device().work_items_per_group(),
00099                                                                                                viennacl::ocl::device().work_items_per_group());
00100     }

00110     template<typename SCALARTYPE, typename F, unsigned int ALIGNMENT, unsigned int VEC_ALIGNMENT>
00111     void inplace_solve(const matrix<SCALARTYPE, F, ALIGNMENT> & mat,
00112                        vector<SCALARTYPE, VEC_ALIGNMENT> & vec,
00113                        lower_tag)
00114     {
00115       assert(mat.size1() == vec.size());
00116       assert(mat.size2() == vec.size());

00118       unsigned int pos = 0;
00119       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::lower_triangular_substitute_inplace.setArgument(pos++, mat.handle());
00120       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::lower_triangular_substitute_inplace.setArgument(pos++, vec.handle());
00121       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::lower_triangular_substitute_inplace.setArgument(pos++, mat.internal_size2());
00122       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::lower_triangular_substitute_inplace.setArgument(pos++, vec.size());
00123       
00124       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::lower_triangular_substitute_inplace.start1D(viennacl::ocl::device().work_items_per_group(),
00125                                                                                          viennacl::ocl::device().work_items_per_group());

00133     template<typename SCALARTYPE, typename F, unsigned int ALIGNMENT, unsigned int VEC_ALIGNMENT>
00134     void inplace_solve(const matrix<SCALARTYPE, F, ALIGNMENT> & mat,
00135                        vector<SCALARTYPE, VEC_ALIGNMENT> & vec,
00136                        unit_lower_tag)
00137     {
00138       assert(mat.size1() == vec.size());
00139       assert(mat.size2() == vec.size());
00140 
00141       unsigned int pos = 0;
00142       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::unit_lower_triangular_substitute_inplace.setArgument(pos++, mat.handle());
00143       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::unit_lower_triangular_substitute_inplace.setArgument(pos++, vec.handle());
00144       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::unit_lower_triangular_substitute_inplace.setArgument(pos++, mat.internal_size2());
00145       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::unit_lower_triangular_substitute_inplace.setArgument(pos++, vec.size());
00146       
00147       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::unit_lower_triangular_substitute_inplace.start1D(viennacl::ocl::device().work_items_per_group(),
00148                                                                                               viennacl::ocl::device().work_items_per_group());
00149     }

00156     template<typename SCALARTYPE, typename F, unsigned int ALIGNMENT, unsigned int VEC_ALIGNMENT>
00157     void inplace_solve(const transposed_matrix_proxy<SCALARTYPE, F, ALIGNMENT> & proxy,
00158                        vector<SCALARTYPE, VEC_ALIGNMENT> & vec,
00159                        lower_tag)
00160     {
00161       assert(proxy.get_matrix().size1() == vec.size());
00162       assert(proxy.get_matrix().size2() == vec.size());
00163 
00164       unsigned int pos = 0;
00165       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::trans_lower_triangular_substitute_inplace.setArgument(pos++, proxy.get_matrix().handle());
00166       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::trans_lower_triangular_substitute_inplace.setArgument(pos++, vec.handle());
00167       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::trans_lower_triangular_substitute_inplace.setArgument(pos++, proxy.get_matrix().internal_size2());
00168       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::trans_lower_triangular_substitute_inplace.setArgument(pos++, vec.size());
00169       
00170       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::trans_lower_triangular_substitute_inplace.start1D(viennacl::ocl::device().work_items_per_group(),
00171                                                                                                viennacl::ocl::device().work_items_per_group());
00172     }

00183     template<typename SCALARTYPE, typename F, unsigned int ALIGNMENT, unsigned int VEC_ALIGNMENT, typename TAG>
00184     vector<SCALARTYPE, VEC_ALIGNMENT> solve(const matrix<SCALARTYPE, F, ALIGNMENT> & mat,
00185                                         const vector<SCALARTYPE, VEC_ALIGNMENT> & vec,
00186                                         TAG const & tag)
00187     {
00188       // do an inplace solve on the result vector:
00189       vector<SCALARTYPE, VEC_ALIGNMENT> result(vec.size());
00190       result = vec;
00191     
00192       inplace_solve(mat, result, tag);
00193     
00194       return result;
00195     }
00196 
00203     template<typename SCALARTYPE, typename F, unsigned int ALIGNMENT, unsigned int VEC_ALIGNMENT, typename TAG>
00204     vector<SCALARTYPE, VEC_ALIGNMENT> solve(const transposed_matrix_proxy<SCALARTYPE, F, ALIGNMENT> & proxy,
00205                                         const vector<SCALARTYPE, VEC_ALIGNMENT> & vec,
00206                                         TAG const & tag)
00207     {
00208       // do an inplace solve on the result vector:
00209       vector<SCALARTYPE, VEC_ALIGNMENT> result(vec.size());
00210       result = vec;
00211     
00212       inplace_solve(proxy, result, tag);
00213     
00214       return result;
00215     }

00225     template<typename SCALARTYPE, typename F, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00226     void lu_factorize(matrix<SCALARTYPE, F, ALIGNMENT> & mat)
00227     {
00228       assert(mat.size1() == mat.size2());
00229 
00230       unsigned int pos = 0;
00231       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::lu_factorize.setArgument(pos++, mat.handle());
00232       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::lu_factorize.setArgument(pos++, mat.internal_size2());
00233       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::lu_factorize.setArgument(pos++, mat.size1());
00234       
00235       kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::lu_factorize.start1D(viennacl::ocl::device().work_items_per_group(),
00236                                                                   viennacl::ocl::device().work_items_per_group());
00237     }
00238 
00239 
00245     template<typename SCALARTYPE, typename F, unsigned int ALIGNMENT, unsigned int VEC_ALIGNMENT>
00246     void lu_substitute(matrix<SCALARTYPE, F, ALIGNMENT> const & mat,
00247                        vector<SCALARTYPE, VEC_ALIGNMENT> & vec)
00248     {
00249       assert(mat.size1() == mat.size2());
00250       inplace_solve(mat, vec, unit_lower_tag());
00251       inplace_solve(mat, vec, upper_tag());
00252     }
